summary: Adds characters of the Order of the Stick (Cartoon by Rich Burlew) to Skyrim\'s major cities\' inns.
descriptionHtml:
Currently bugged, I am doing everything to fix it.

Adds characters of the Order of the Stick (Cartoon by Rich Burlew) to Skyrim\'s major cities\' inns. 

Locations:
Roy: Markarth (Silver-Blood Inn) (Curently bugged)
Vaarsuvius: Solitude (Winking Skeever Inn) 
Durkon: Windhelm (Candlehearth Hall Inn)
Haley and Elan: Whiterun (Bannered Mare Inn) (Haley bugged)
Belkar: Riften (The Bee and Barb Inn)

Problems:
- All characters are resistant to damage
- This mod clashes with UFO (ultimate follower overhaul) - Roy won\'t stop following you, 
- Haley is refusing to follow you, maybe because of her membership in Thieves Guild

Objectives:
- Adding a quest
- Making the items unobtainable
- Elan talking about the OOTS\' adventures and being more dumbish
- Adding Linear Guild followers, Xykon\'s team followers and Sapphire Guard followers
- More obvious relationship between Haley and Elan
- Adding perks similar to these given by Paarthurnax
- Adding training options 
- Creating halfling and dwarven race, so Belkar and Durkon won\'t be Breton (or Imperials)
Interesting things about the Order members:
- Elan is a full member of Bards\' College, so you can ask him to play and sing.
- Durkon wields one-handed hammer. 
- Elan is intelligent
- Vaarsuvius can conjure 

Credits:
Rich Burlew - Creating OOTS
Bethesda - Creating Creation Kit


Write your ideas in the discussion I created.
author: thepitchforkoffate
